Title: Designates the uniformed court officers of the town of Busti, as peace officers
Summary: Designates the uniformed court officers of the town of Busti, in the county of Chautauqua, as peace officers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to designating uniformed court officers in the town of Busti, county of Chautauqua, as peace officers
